current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To repeal the provisions of the Patient Protection and
		  Affordable Care Act providing for the Independent Payment Advisory
		  Board.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read the first time

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the
			 calendar

Read the second time and placed on the
		  calendar

short-title.#text:
Protecting Seniors’ Access to Medicare
			 Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:3403

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(including the amendments made by such sections) are
			 repealed, and any provision of law amended by such sections is hereby restored
			 as if such sections had not been enacted into law.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:10320

text.#text: Effective as of the enactment of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Patient
			 Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

header.#text:
Repeal of the
			 Independent Payment Advisory Board
